#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

    int t,x1,x2,x3,y1,y2,y3,d;
    int id;
    int arr[3];
    cin>>id;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int d1=0;
        int d2=0;
        int d3=0;

        cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2>>x3>>y3;

        d1=pow((y2-y1),2)+pow((x2-x1),2);
        d2=pow((y3-y1),2)+pow((x3-x1),2);
        d3=pow((y3-y2),2)+pow((x3-x2),2);



        arr[0]=d1;
        arr[1]=d2;
        arr[2]=d3;


        sort(arr,arr+3);
        

        if(id==1)
        {
            if(d1!=d2 && d2!=d3 && d3!=d1)
            {
                cout<<"Scalene triangle"<<endl;
            }
            else
                cout<<"Isosceles triangle"<<endl;

        }
        else{

            if(d1!=d2 && d2!=d3 && d3!=d1)
            {

                if(arr[0]+arr[1]==arr[2])
                {
                    cout<<"Scalene right triangle"<<endl;

                }
                else if(arr[0]+arr[1]<arr[2])
                {
                    cout<<"Scalene obtuse triangle"<<endl;
                }
                else
                    cout<<"Scalene acute triangle"<<endl;
            }
            else
            {



                if(arr[0]+arr[1]==arr[2])
                {
                    cout<<"Isosceles right triangle"<<endl;

                }
                else if(arr[0]+arr[1]<arr[2])
                {
                    cout<<"Isosceles obtuse triangle"<<endl;
                }
                else
                    cout<<"Isosceles acute triangle"<<endl;


            }

        }}
        return 0;
    }
